name: Spooky Night (itch)
description:
Hey Everybody!

Grimelda is still at it but with some new tricks and treats in store!
A Casual Fantasy FPS for the whole family We have overhauled and updated the original Spooky Night VR game for the Oculus Quest.
Its Halloween night and your walking past a cemetery when you notice a pot of sweet delicious candy.Suddenly, out of nowhere a voice appears, It's the witch Grimelda! She has trapped you inside and you must survive and fight your way out. Defeat her minions and keep the candy, but should you lose you will become one of her minions forever! Fight your way through 7 challenging levels as you defeat, Skeletons, Zombies,Mummy's,Werewolf's, Orcs, and Dragons.Also collect treats and tricks along the way.

Will you survive this Spooky Night ?
